name: Gojo_Satoru
description: Gojo is a Telegram Group management bot made using Pyrogram and Python, which makes it modern and faster than most of the Telegram chat managers.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your telegram bot token, get from @Botfather in telegram.

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for pyrogram base.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for pyrogram base.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where user's can contact in case of a problem..

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Event logs channel where bot will send updates.

VERSION.description: A Version to be shown in bot.

PREFIX_HANDLER.description: Something like '/' to execute commands...Don't give comma or anything after 1 handler just give and space then enter second hand;ler

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot. Use space to seprate values

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Channel where bot uodates will be posted!

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs whitelisted, cannot be restricted.

GENIUS_API.description: Your Lyrics Genius Api Token. To fetch lyrics of songs

AuDD_API.description: Your Audd api to get info of song by music file

BDB_URI.description: Your mongodb uri different from previous one to store more info

RMBG_API.description: Your removebackground api to remove the background

WORKERS.description: Number of workers to run the bot.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is
